adrFormatAddress: 535 5th Ave 4th floor, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: I want to start off my giving a huge  thank you to Michell Schroeder. I contacted his law firm because I work in the Bronx, NY and was involved in a car accident while on duty. Mitchell Schroeder and his assistant Donnell Bridges went above and beyond to help me out and make sure I received the most I could from my case. I was extremely satisfied with my settlement and Mitch made sure he worked his hardest to get me what I deserved. I have to give a huge thank you also to Don, he check in on me very often, helped me whenever I needed and knew everyone of my appointments and always followed up with me the very next day to see how everything went. Together Mitch and Don make an amazing team and really go above and beyond to show you they care about you, your well being and your case. I really enjoyed working with them and would recommend them to anyone who might need assistance. My questions were always answered and in a timely manner. I’ve dealt with other lawyers/law firms before and I felt like they were only invested for getting the money and not for my concerns and the help I deserved, I never felt that way about Mitch. He’s very compassionate and good at what he does. I would tell anyone to definitely give them a call for a consultation and see for yourself the team that they are and you won’t be sorry. They would even call me about things that didn’t involve my case.  Mitch, Don and I really did form a special bond. I can’t thank you both enough for all you have done for me! I had an amazing experience and have you to thank for it!

originalText.text:
I am glad I was referred to Mitchell Schroeder's firm, the team is pleasant and professional. Mitch does not leave you in the loop, I trusted him with any decision making about my case and I always get an update. Mitch has your best interest at heart, he will make sure you get compensated for your injuries. I am highly satisfied to have chosen to work with him. I would recommend him even in my sleep.
Thank you M. Schroeder and Don

originalText.text: Mitchell Schroeder, Don bridges and staff are very professional, reliable and friendly! My process went very fast and smooth. He's a phenomenal attorney who fights extremely hard for his clients. They are always attentive and available when you need them. They treat you like a vip client. I am very satisfied with my settlement and I highly recommend the Law Offices of Mitchell J Schroeder  for representation. You will not be disappoint I promise.

originalText.text: Mitchell J. Schroeder, P.C. provided me with legal representation for a pedestrian accident that occurred in East Harlem, NY.  From beginning to the end, I received excellent service from Mitchell and his team.  The firm worked around my schedule to coordinate all my appointments and continually ensured that I was happy.  In addition, the firm did an amazing job making sure that I received best medical care.  I am grateful to have had Mitchell as my legal representative. He is not only a great attorney but also a great person.  I would not hesitate to recommend Mitch Schroeder to anyone looking for a fantastic attorney.

originalText.text: I was referred to Mitch & Donnell from a previous client of theirs they are very Honest, Upfront, Hardworking Lawyers to have working on your case. They are very professional & most definitely get the job done. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a Lawyer.
